Merge pull request #271 from olivierkaisin/fix-blurry-text

Fixes the blurry text issue at animation end

Merge pull request #261 from pesrepus/master

Fix function getScrollbarWidth

Merge pull request #251 from brentswisher/master

Fix issue caused by calling remodal.close() when it is already closed

Fix function getScrollbarWidth

$(document.body).height() gets the same height as $(window).height() in some cases (for example if you use the foundation framework, because it sets the body height to 100%).
Change $(document.body).height() to $(document).height() works fine.

Add check to remodal.prototype.close function to return if remodal.state is already closed. Currently if remodal.close() is called multiple times the modal will hang in CLOSING and become unresponsive. Fixes #241 and #246

Merge pull request #211 from esbanarango/master

Adding README section for wrappers.

add appendTo option
add appendTo option to attach remodal wrapper to a different DOM element than document.body

Fixed getAnimationDuration is always returns last value.

Add baseClass option

Add namespace option (+5 squashed commits)

PR #69

Squashed commits:
[10e6594] Rename baseClass -> namespace
[75cd917] Revert changes to /dist folder
[550ca85] Use pluginName instead of baseClass for instance
[292fb7e] Attach baseClass as main class to modal instead of pluginName
[49ffca6] Add baseClass option
Add the 'reason' parameter to the close/closed events(#65)

Merge pull request #67 from Kris-B/master

Avoid jump to top of page

Avoid jump to top of page


Not setting the `-is-locked` class to body will avoid the scroll to the top of the page when a remodal is opened.
The workaround `html, body { overflow: auto !important; margin: 0; }` has side effects causing lazy loading on some jQuery plugin not to work.

Merge pull request #41 from paulcredmond/master

Basic IE8 Support

Update jquery.remodal.js

Added two new options, CloseOnEscape can allow or not ESC Key to close
the modal. And CloseOnAnyClick can allow or not by clicking anywhere to
close the modal.

Merge pull request #36 from c316/patch-1

Move @import to the top of the file.

Moved @import to the top of the file.

Meteor requires the @import to be at the top. Not sure if there are other languages that prefer or require this.
